value:
$WmMPID_砂漠カタリナ,ch01_27_Katarina_F_Plegia21,Face|Found anything suspicious, Kris?$k$p$WmMPID_砂漠クリス男,ch01_37_Chris_M_Plegia21,Face|Not yet. But still, don't let your guard
down until we're through here.$k$p$WmMPID_砂漠サーリャ,ch04_10_Sallya_F_Plegia21,Face|I need to end this, and quickly, so
I can go find Robin... And if anyone
gets in my way, I'll kill them.$k$p$WmMPID_砂漠ラファエル,ch17_21_Rafael_M_Plegia21,Face|But where's the food though?
I'm so hungry!$k$p$WmMPID_双界ドロテア,ch17_11_Dorothea_FF_Pair,Face|Ugh. There's much more sand in my
clothes than I'd like. It's everywhere!$k$pI'm headed straight for the shower
as soon as we've wrapped this up.$k$p$nMPID_リーン|Same here! I'll enchant anyone I have
to in order to speed things along...
No sand can stop my dancing!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_MNS_FE13_06,0|$WmMPID_砂漠カタリナ,ch01_27_Katarina_F_Plegia21,Face|I've looked everywhere, but...I've
seen nothing suspicious.$k$pThe Plegians must not be plotting
to resurrect the Fell Dragon after all.
They just worship it in earnest...$k$p$WmMPID_砂漠クリス男,ch01_37_Chris_M_Plegia21,Face|I agree. Our worries were unfounded,
though I am glad we've confirmed.$k$p$WmMPID_砂漠カタリナ,ch01_27_Katarina_F_Plegia21,Face|Yes. Thank goodness we don't have
to worry.$k$p...$k$p$WmMPID_砂漠クリス男,ch01_37_Chris_M_Plegia21,Face|Is...something wrong, Katarina?$k$p$WmMPID_砂漠カタリナ,ch01_27_Katarina_F_Plegia21,Face|As we were investigating, I overheard
a fair few conversations between the
Plegians at the festival.$k$pEveryone spoke with some regret,
even in light of the festival.$k$pThe Fell Dragon reminds them of
past wars, and regret over those
slain. They speak of a fallen Exalt...$k$pWhen I heard they worshiped the Fell
Dragon, I imagined them as a malign
people, but now I don't think so.$k$pThey are no different from me,
in truth of fact.$k$pI, too, have done wrong in the past.
But you and Marth, you supported
me—and it allowed me to change.$k$pDo you think the people of Plegia
will get that same chance?$k$p$WmMPID_砂漠クリス男,ch01_37_Chris_M_Plegia21,Face|Don't worry, Katarina. Even if one
commits a crime, there are limitless
opportunities for redemption.$k$pWouldn't you agree?$k$p$WmMPID_砂漠カタリナ,ch01_27_Katarina_F_Plegia21,Face|Yes... You're right.$k$pNow we should get back and submit
our mission report.$k$p$WmMPID_砂漠クリス男,ch01_37_Chris_M_Plegia21,Face|Right. Er...Katarina, wait.$k$p$WmMPID_砂漠カタリナ,ch01_27_Katarina_F_Plegia21,Face|What is it?$k$p$WmMPID_砂漠クリス男,ch01_37_Chris_M_Plegia21,Face|We still have some time here. And we
don't often get the opportunity... Why
not enjoy the festival a little?$k$pThis is the first you've been to, right?
I've noticed you sneaking curious
glances at all the sights we've passed.$k$p$WmMPID_砂漠カタリナ,ch01_27_Katarina_F_Plegia21,Face|Oh, you noticed that?
That's embarrassing...$k$p$WmMPID_砂漠クリス男,ch01_37_Chris_M_Plegia21,Face|If you don't want to stay, we don't
have to, but I thought—$k$p$WmMPID_砂漠カタリナ,ch01_27_Katarina_F_Plegia21,Face|No, I'd like that! Just some time with
you to enjoy a festival? I feel it may
make me happier than I deserve.$k$p$WmMPID_砂漠クリス男,ch01_37_Chris_M_Plegia21,Face|Always the dramatic one, aren't
you, Katarina. Well then, shall we?$k$p$WmMPID_砂漠カタリナ,ch01_27_Katarina_F_Plegia21,Face|Yes, let's!$k$p$Sbs150|
